price: 127. Sidaasaan ku abaal marinaa ciddii xadgudubta oo aan rumeyn Aayadaha Rabbigii, cadaabka Aakhiro ayaana sii daran oo joogto daa'in ah.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡمِنۢ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦۚ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَبۡقَىٰٓ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika najzī man asrafa walam yu'min biāyāti rabbihi walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaddu wa-abqā
